Key:
I wonder what's gotten into Rinne today...
She mentioned she's going to run errands
this morning, but she's late.
Hm?

Shido, sorry for taking so much time!
How's the dinner prep going?

Oh... Yeah, I figured you'd be late, so I took
care of everything. It's been a while so it was
enjoyable. But, how's everything going with you?

Oh, fine. Just fine. I just had an important
matter to attend to.
I see. Were you able to take care of it, then?

Y-Yeah, somehow. Sorry for not reaching out
to you...

Oh, don't worry about it. This is how it
should be.
But...

Rinne, you don't have to always think of
our home, you know? Besides, it seems like
we're starting to depend on you too much.

I-It's not like that at all! I'm only doing
it because I want to...

Well, even if that were the case, it's test
week, so it's not good for us to rely on you
so often.
What...?

So I've been thinking... During test week,
I should be the one to step up.

Oh... I see. It appears I was out
of line then...

No, not at all! I can't thank you enough
for what you've done for us, Rinne!

But I also think it's important to have time
for yourself, Rinne. Besides, I can't start to
lose my touch, too.

I see. Very well, Shido. Once you've made up
your mind, I can tell there's no convincing you.

Impressive, Rinne. You know me too well.
Makes everything easy.
But... you could lean back on me, you know?
Hm? Did you say something?

No, nothing. Anyways, let me wash the dishes.
I'm allowed to help, right?

Yeah. If we tackle it together, we can finish
faster. Thanks.
Hehe... Leave it to me.
